fill_in_the_blanks.question: If I put my fingers on my wrist, then I can feel my pulse
My nose can smell cakes baking in mother's kitchen
Today I am not going to watch TV

meanings.chewing: biting food in the mouth with the teeth
meanings.electricity: a form of energy resulting from the existence of charged particles
meanings.pulse: a rhythmical throbbing of the arteries as blood is propelled through them

choices: Because my mother asked me not to
Because I dont like to go to school
multiple_choice.question: Why am I not going to school today?
What am I going to do today?

multiple_choice.answer: By jumping up and down twenty times
multiple_choice.question: How can I make my heart go faster?
